greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 7^n mod 37.
comment: Sequence is periodic with length 9. Since a(18) = 1, 37 is composite in Z[sqrt(7)]: it can be factored as (10 - 3*sqrt(7))(10 + 3*sqrt(7)). - _Alonso del Arte_, Oct 12 2012
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
program: (Sage) [power_mod(7,n,37) for n in range(0,78)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 27 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 12 2002
